response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds significant value to me and I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to both parties, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $9,500. I understand its value to you is estimated at $8,000, and I hope this offer strikes a balance that benefits us both. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly.", "product_price": 9500}
